artist: Painter: After Nicolas Poussin; Draftsman: William Marshall Craig; Engraver: Peltro William Tomkins; Publisher: Longman, Hurst, Rees, Orme, and Brown London; Publisher: Cadell and Davies; Publisher: J. White & Co.
description: two images printed on one sheet; Baptism: landscape with John the Baptist baptising Jesus who is kneeling before him; crowd of people around them; dove above Christ's head Confirmation: several kneeling Christians in foreground; priest seated at left anointing them with chrism; large group observing; in a church interior
inscription:
Signature, Title, Date, and Inscriptions

above top image in black: Class the First  BAPTISM   School of Lower Italy / 12  | below image in black: Poussin    5.71/2 by 3.9  
above lower image in black: CONFIRMATION / 13  | below image in black: Poussin   5.8 by 3.9 / Drawn by W.M. Craig.  Engraved by P.W. Tomkins, Engraver to Her Majesty. / Published Jan\'y 1. 1808 by Longman, Hurst, Rees & Orme, Pater Noster Row / J. White, Fleet Street, Cadell & Davies, Strand & P.W. Tomkins, New Bond Street | on sheet in pencil: 2-234
provenance: John Crosby, Minneapolis; given to MIA, 1947.
title: Baptisim / Confirmation
